content: place the second marker after stitch 32 36 40 to mark toe decreases attach yarn a knit 1 round continue to shaping the toes 9 skyscrapers swim r1 *k1 k2tog knit to three stitches before the marker ssk k1* repeat from * to * finishing at the bor r2 knit all stitches r3 knit all stitches knit rounds 1 and 2 until there are 18 20 22 stitches between markers 36 40 44 stitches altogether repeat round 1 until there are 8 10 12 stitches between markers 16 20 24 altogether sew together using kitchener stitch repeat for the second sock which was put aside alternatively toes can be done taat enjoy wearing the socks ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ charts page charts for each size are arranged so they fit to two sides of a therefore the order of charts and the order of knitting is not the same knitting follows charts a b and c in the pattern charts are in the a c b sequence each chart starts with new numbering of rounds so when you finish the skyscrapers the first round in chart b that includes a heel flap is marked as 1 similarly chart c starts with round 1 after the one round after the heel turn finally chart a includes the stranded pattern only chart a is for one leg only and should be repeated twice in each round the repetition is separated by bridges which are not included in chart a chart b counts front leg and back leg separately so you can find 32 36 40 stitches twice in the chart the triangular heel flap is part of the back leg and is counted separately to ensure the correct number of heel stitches before the heel turn chart c gives the instep only the sole is in stocking stitch except for the gusset which is explained in the instructions 10 skyscrapers swim chart symbols in symbols are given white on the coloured background or black on the white background for better visibility as illustrated for the slip_stitch the meaning of the symbols is the same 11 skyscrapers swim charts s 64 stitches chart a legs chart c insteps 12 skyscrapers swim charts b triangular heel flaps 13 skyscrapers swim charts m 72 stitches chart a legs chart c insteps 14 skyscrapers swim charts b triangular heel flaps 15 skyscrapers swim charts l 80 stitches chart a legs chart c instep 16 skyscrapers swim charts b triangular heel flaps 17 skyscrapers swim model of steeked socks are are s is to better understand where in the structure sock 1 and sock 2 what the front and back leg and which of the socks the left and the right in the final product the model below might be helpful note the left side of the model coincides with position of bor cut the model out fold twice along dashed lines marked with fold the inner side of the model should be blank printed comments should be seen when
